MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the FK7 postcode area of Stirling. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1am. Our engineers have arrived at the Torburn Avenue substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:42am on 7th February 2021
